headline: PG&E, Nissan, Fermata Energy, and the Schatz Energy Research Center Demonstrate Vehicle-to-Grid Technology in California
summary: Pacific Gas and Electric Company (PG&E), Nissan, and Fermata Energy are collaborating on a first-of-its-kind demonstration of automated frequency capabilities integrating electric vehicles and bi-directional chargers with a multi-customer microgrid to provide grid support and enhance energy resilience.

headline: How Recent Developments Are Rewriting the Story for PG&E
summary: PG&E’s fair value estimate remains steady at $21.23 per share. A recent update shows a slight uptick in the discount rate from 6.78% to 6.96%. While the company’s revenue growth projection holds firm at 3.88%, evolving analyst sentiment has contributed to more nuanced views on the stock’s trajectory. Stay tuned to see how evolving market dynamics and analyst commentary could shape your strategy for keeping up with shifts in PG&E’s investment narrative. Stay updated as the Fair Value for PG&E...
